perturbation.original_text:
“Aircraft”
 
means collectively or individually as the context requires the ATR aircraft listed in Exhibit 1 (“List
of ATR Aircraft covered under this Agreement”), amended from time to time by way of notice sent
to the Company , as relevant, by Repairer in order to cover any further ATR aircraft entering the
Company’s fleet, including the airframe, engines, propellers and landing gears and parts installed
on the Aircraft, when solely operated by the Company ;
perturbation.changed_text:
“Aircraft”
 
means collectively or individually as the context requires the ATR aircraft initially listed in Exhibit 1 (“List
of ATR Aircraft covered under this Agreement”), and only those aircraft. No amendments can be made to Exhibit 1. Aircraft includes the airframe but specifically excludes the engines, propellers and landing gears.
perturbation.explanation: This introduces an in-text contradiction because the original definition allows for amendments to the list of aircraft in Exhibit 1 and includes specific components. The modified definition prohibits amendments and excludes key aircraft components, thus, creating ambiguity.

perturbation.original_text:
“Notice”
 
means any notice or communication pertaining to this Agreement which shall be given in writing
delivered by hand and/or by courier service with proof of delivery
and/or by fax, and:
 
a) if delivered by hand, shall have been deemed received when so delivered; or,
 
b) if delivered by registered mail, shall be deemed to have been received by the addressee on the
Day on which it shall have signed as received; or,
 
c) if delivered by fax, shall be deemed to have been received by the addressee on the next
Business Day following electronic acknowledgement.
 
In the event a Party chooses to give a Notice by several of the aforesaid means, the earliest of the
receipt dates will be considered.
 
In any case, any notice or communication shall be also transmitted by an e-mail with attached copy
of such (in format PDF or similar support)n, for courtesy purpose only.
perturbation.changed_text:
“Notice”
 
means any notice or communication pertaining to this Agreement which must be delivered exclusively via certified mail with return receipt. No other form of communication, including but not limited to hand delivery, courier, or fax, shall constitute valid notice under this agreement. Email communications are strictly prohibited and will not be acknowledged as a valid form of notice.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by restricting 'Notice' to certified mail only, whereas the original definition allows for multiple methods including hand delivery, courier and fax, with email as a courtesy. It creates ambiguity about the validity of different communication forms and their acknowledgement.

perturbation.changed_text:
8.1
The Company shall maintain in force, at all times during the Term, at its own costs and expenses, with any insurers deemed acceptable by the Company, insurances in accordance with minimum local requirements. The Company is solely responsible for assessing the risk and determining appropriate coverage amounts.
perturbation.explanation: This introduces a contradiction regarding insurance requirements. The original text mandates using internationally recognized insurers reasonably acceptable to the Repairer. The modified version allows the Company to choose any insurer and coverage based on minimum local requirements, potentially conflicting with the Repairer's risk assessment.
